content: In the meantime, Kuma, having used his ability to transport himself, ended up colliding into the Red Line, and falling into Red Port. He then attempted to climb up the continent, though was met with great resistance as the Marines fired mortars at him, causing him to fall of the wall. They continued to attack him while calling for back up, as the former Warlord while single-mindedly attempting to ascend the continent. Elsewhere, the Kid Pirates sighted Elbaf.
